resources.string: You don\'t need it anymore as the recovery image is in-built with the A/B partition.
Smart Flasher is a simple app aimed to make flashing recovery zips much easier.

Thank you very much for supporting the developer by allowing Ads!\n\nHowever, please be noted that allowing Ads sometimes results weired behaviour. If you encounter any such issues, feel free to disable it.
Backing up %s of your device into
The details of the already backed up partitions are listed on this page.
Failed to get Boot Partition identity

It is highly recommended to have a standalone BusyBox installation on your device to work some features of this app properly (e.g., \'unzip\' & \'mke2fs\' binaries for flashing & \'curl\' or \'wget\' binary for kernel OTA updates). As an attempt to help users on this issue, a simple app is made available, which can be used as a one-click BusyBox installation utility for arm, arm64 and x86 device. Click here to Get It!

Congrats! Ads will be disabled soon!\n\nHowever, please be noted that the revenue obtained from these Ads are really helpful for the developer to continue his android development projects more active. If it doesn\'t hurt you much, please consider allowing the Ads to support the development.
\nIf you like to appreciate my work, please consider donating to me as it is helpful to continue my projects more active, although it is not at all necessary.\n
\nPlease note: I can accept donations either via PayPal, or through SmartPack Donation Package in PlayStore.\n
Want to appreciate my work with a Donation? Click here
Donation link is not provided by the developer yet!
%s is successfully downloaded. Do you want to flash it?
It seems like the download is failed, or a corrupted file is downloaded!
Warning! You\'re selected a file of ~%s MB for flashing. Flashing bigger files, such as ROM\'s, using this app might be dangerous to your device.
Click the flash button to select and flash a recovery ZIP file without rebooting into custom recovery. The changes will be applied after a reboot.
Warning: Flashing a wrong 'img' file likely brick your device. Please be careful.

Warning: This feature is still very new and under development. It may not have full compatibility with many flashable zip files. If you think that the flashing process failed in any case due to the above mentioned incompatibilities, please restart the app immediately before doing anything.

***USE AT YOUR OWN RISK***

Smart Flasher is a free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

Smart Flasher is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with Smart Flasher. If not, visit http://www.gnu.org/licenses/.
Click here, or the backup button, to start a new back up/flashing processes. The backed-up partitions will be available at \'%s\'.
Permission denied for writing to storage!
Visit Smart Flasher page on PlayStore
It is highly recommended to reboot your device after flashing.
Turn Off or Reboot your device
Failed to get Recovery Partition identity
Flasher Log file is exported as %s!
Share Smart Flasher with your friends
\'%s\' | error log shared by Smart Flasher!

To configure this update channel, simply input '%s' on SmartFlasher -> Update Channel Url.

Get Smart Flasher from
PlayStore: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.smartpack.smartflasher
GitHub: https://github.com/SmartPack/SmartFlasher/blob/master/release/com.smartpack.smartflasher.apk?raw=true
In order to fix this issue, please consider sharing the log file created at \'%s\' with the developer of this app.\nDo you want to share it now?

Here is the contents of the log file
'%s'
Failed to get latest version information!
Smart Flasher will check for a new version of %s once in a day!
Check for a new versions of Smart Flasher
%s\n\n**Important: Please download and manually update the app!**

By linking the above update channel with a proper json file for your device, you can basically add kernel download, and auto-flash (not for all devices) support to any Kernel's available for your device. Please ask your favourite kernel developer to add support to this feature. The downloaded kernel will be available at '%s'.

Tips! You can import a json file created for franciscofranco's (huge ♥ & respect to him) 'FK-Kernel Manager' and it will simply work.

Need more help? Click here!
You\'ve entered an invalid Url! Aborting.
Please select a file with %s extension.
